p01_circular.title: Circular
p01_circular.description: Site-specific installation at Fraunhofer Institute for Interfacial Engineering and Biotechnology IGB Stuttgart. The work embodies a diverse and biobased economy (bioeconomy) by displaying different facets of scientific research in this field.

p02_ion.title: Index of Noise
p02_ion.description: Ongoing artistic research project emerging from an eponymous work by Moritz Hundbiß and Robin Woern and Superposed Patterns by Niklas Thran.

p03_pi.title: Pi
p03_pi.description: Kinetic sculpture based on the noise of randomly distributed digits of pi. The noise appears as a seemingly inexhaustible well of non-periodic elements, setting the objects in motion.

p04_tabula-rasa.title: Tabula Rasa
p04_tabula-rasa.description: Data-driven video installation. Inspired by the philosophical concept of the clean slate, it explores the technology of Deep Reinforcement Learning in machine learning.

p05_rn-generator.title: RN-Generator with Serial Interface
p05_rn-generator.description: Experimental device that deals with the generation of random numbers (RN) based on environmental influences for use in visual design and image generation.
